TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GiveFeedbackEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: Provides data for the event, which occurs during a drag operation.

span.span: Provides data for the event, which occurs during a drag operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 拖曳作業期間發生的事件。The event occurs during a drag operation. 它可讓修改滑鼠指標外觀，以便將使用者視覺化回應提供拖放作業期間的拖曳事件來源。It allows the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation. A物件指定的拖放作業，以及是否使用預設資料指標類型。A object specifies the type of drag-and-drop operation and whether default cursors are used. 事件模型的相關資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For information about the event model, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例假設有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Effect As DragDropEffects
public: property System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects Effect { System::Windows::Forms::DragDropEffects get(); };

summary.span: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.

span.span: Gets the drag-and-drop operation feedback that is displayed.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例假設有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop/VB/form1.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseDefaultCursors { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.

span.span: Gets or sets whether drag operation should use the default cursors that are associated with drag-drop effects.

value.span: 如果使用預設指標;否則， 。

span.span: if the default pointers are used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統會提供不同的拖放作業，例如移動或複製拖放資料指標預設值。The system provides default drag-drop cursors for different drag-drop operations such as move or copy. 如果設`false`，它是要設定適當的資料指標的事件來源的責任。If is set to `false`, it is the responsibility of the event source to set the appropriate cursor. ## Examples 下列範例會示範兩個之間的拖放作業控制項。The following example demonstrates a drag-and-drop operation between two controls. 範例會呼叫時拖曳動作開始的方法。The example calls the method when the drag action starts. 如果已移動滑鼠拖曳動作會啟動多個期間的滑鼠位置事件。The drag action starts if the mouse has moved more than from the mouse location during the event. 方法用來決定要在拖曳的項目索引`MouseDown`事件。The method is used to determine the index of the item to drag during the `MouseDown` event. 此範例也示範如何使用自訂游標拖放作業。The example also demonstrates using custom cursors for the drag-and-drop operation. 這個範例假設有兩個資料指標檔案`3dwarro.cur`和`3dwno.cur`、 自訂拖放到的應用程式目錄，存在於和不置放資料指標，分別。The example assumes that two cursor files, `3dwarro.cur` and `3dwno.cur`, exist in the application directory, for the custom drag and no-drop cursors, respectively. 如果使用自訂游標`UseCustomCursorsCheck`已核取。The custom cursors will be used if the `UseCustomCursorsCheck` is checked. 自訂的資料指標中所設定事件處理常式。The custom cursors are set in the event handler. 鍵盤的狀態會在評估右邊的事件處理常式`ListBox`，以決定在拖曳作業將會根據 SHIFT、 CTRL、 ALT 或 CTRL + ALT 鍵的狀態。The keyboard state is evaluated in the event handler for the right `ListBox`, to determine what the drag operation will be based upon state of the SHIFT, CTRL, ALT, or CTRL+ALT keys. 中的位置`ListBox`期間也決定會卸除`DragOver`事件。The location in the `ListBox` where the drop would occur is also determined during the `DragOver` event. 如果要卸除的資料不是`String`，然後在設。If the data to drop is not a `String`, then the is set to . 最後，卸除的狀態會顯示在`DropLocationLabel` 。Finally, the status of the drop is displayed in the `DropLocationLabel`. 若要提供的權限卸除資料`ListBox`決定事件處理常式和`String`中適當的位置加入值`ListBox`。The data to drop for the right `ListBox` is determined in the event handler and the `String` value is added at the appropriate place in the `ListBox`. 如果在拖曳作業移動超出界限的表單，則取消拖放作業事件處理常式。If the drag operation moves outside the bounds of the form, then the drag-and-drop operation is canceled in the event handler. 此程式碼摘錄示範如何使用類別。This code excerpt demonstrates using the class. 請參閱完整程式碼範例的方法。See the method for the complete code example.
